context.p: Google Meet allows one to present their whole screen or a specific window during a meeting.
This includes documents, presentations, and spreadsheets.
How to present during a meeting:
2. At the bottom of the screen, click “Present now”.
3. From there, choose either “Your entire screen”, “A window”, or “A tab”. If showing a Slides
presentation through a different tab, it can be controlled in Meet.
The presentation can be stopped by clicking “Stop Presenting” in the Meet window. At the
bottom right of the screen, click “You are presenting” then “stop presenting”.

p.b: A Chrome browser is required to present directly to Google Meet from Google Docs,
